title: New: Death Cab For Cutie – You Are A Tourist
body:
![](http://blackswansongs.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/death_cab_for_cutie.jpg "DCab")

So three years on from their poorly received sixth album Narrow Stairs, Death Cab For Cutie are back with new track You Are A Tourist. Whilst it doesn’t hark back to their acoustically raw roots, it’s still an enjoyable listen and a positive sign for what’s to come. Since 2003’s hit record Transatlanticism, Death Cab have been become a staple component of the American indie pop charts, and You Are A Tourist is sure to put them right back in the public eye again.

[Death Cab For Cutie – You Are A Tourist](http://soundcloud.com/listenbeforeyoubuy/death-cab-for-cutie-you-are-a) by [ListenBeforeYouBuy](http://soundcloud.com/listenbeforeyoubuy)
